content: this fun christmas stocking knitting pattern creates gorgeous jumbo cabled holiday stockings that look stunning hanging by the fire these stockings are knit in the round from the cuff down **materials ** to make one stocking you will need the following supplies -us size 9 5 5 mm circular knitting needles min 32 cord for magic loop method or double pointed knitting needles -2 skeins 274 yards of knit picks wool of the andes superwash bulky yarn in white or hollyberry -scissors -stitch marker -tapestry/yarn needle -size 8 5mm crochet hook to make hanging loop **measurements ** 7 25 wide x 23 long after folding over the cuff **skill level ** intermediate
